means: 弥漫( permeate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The smell of leather permeated the room.
sentence.Network_cn: 屋子里弥漫着皮革的气味。

sentence.Network_en: His public speeches were permeated with hatred of injustice.
sentence.Network_cn: 在他对民众的演说里,充满了对不公正的愤慨.

sentence.Network_en: The banquet was permeated with an atmosphere of friendship.

PerfectNetExp.abs: The winter morning is permeated with dense mist . Visibility is less than 2 meters ., 冬天的早晨弥漫着浓雾 , 能见度只有不到 2米.
but clay soil does not melt readily , nor allow itself to be permeated .但粘土其实不易融化，也不让本身被水渗入。
our thinking is permeated by our historical myths ., 我们的历史神话渗透着我们的思想.
They have developed a stacked processor that is permeated by a network of channels ., 他们已经开发了一种芯片 , 该芯片中加入了一个渠道网络.

list.abs: helium nucleus 氦核helium permeation 氦渗透helium permeation test 氦渗透试验
permeant 浸透的permeate through 渗透入permeate 弥漫
layer between two phases because of its semi-permeable properties(半渗透性)...The key ability to control theproperty is the permeation rate(渗透速率)of.
permeation 渗透permeation pressure 渗透压permeation rate 渗透速率

entry.tran: （思想、感情、态度）感染，传播，扩散，影响
entry.def: If an idea, feeling, or attitude permeates a system or permeates society, it affects every part of it or is present throughout it.

example.ex: Bias against women permeates every level of the judicial system...
example.tran: 司法体制中各个层面都有歧视女性的现象。

example.ex: An obvious change of attitude at the top will permeate through the system.
example.tran: 上级态度的明显改变将影响到整个体制。

entry.def: If something permeates a place, it spreads throughout it.

example.ex: The smell of roast beef permeated the air...
example.tran: 空气中弥漫着烤牛肉的香味。

example.ex: Eventually, the water will permeate through the surrounding concrete.
example.tran: 最终,水会渗透进周围的混凝土中。

auth_sentence.content: The prose pieces...are also permeated with questions about time.

auth_sentence.content: Dylan felt himself permeated by some ray of attention.
auth_sentence.res_content: Dylan felt himself permeated by some ray of attention.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Dylan felt himself permeated by some ray of attention.

auth_sentence.content: But, by then, Taylorism had permeated the culture.
auth_sentence.res_content: But, by then, Taylorism had permeated the culture.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But, by then, Taylorism had permeated the culture.
